TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CheckBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現核取方塊控制項的方法 (不論有沒有視覺化樣式)。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a check box control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現核取方塊控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a check box control. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要繪製核取方塊，請使用其中一種方法。To draw a check box, use one of the methods. 這些方法會提供各種不同的選項，例如將文字繪製或映像核取方塊。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the check box. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，會繪製目前視覺化樣式的核取方塊。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否則，會繪製傳統 Windows 樣式的核取方塊。Otherwise, will draw the check box with the classic Windows style. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該自動符合作業系統的目前視覺化樣式設定。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個所公開的項目類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫自訂控制項，以便使用繪製核取方塊，以回應滑鼠點選動作的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the method to draw a check box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a check box control.

span.span: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式的核取方塊。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否則，它會繪製傳統 Windows 樣式的核取方塊。Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取方塊圖像的大小取決於作業系統的目前視覺化樣式。The size of the check box glyph is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以判斷核取方塊文字的界限。The following code example uses the method to determine the bounds of the check box text. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出產生器是否會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，則會使用從設定屬性來判斷呈現樣式。If the property is `true`, the uses the setting from the property to determine the rendering style. 如果是`false`，轉譯器一律會呈現使用視覺化樣式。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
